title: Disease characteristics influence the privacy calculus to adopt electronic health records: A survey study in Germany

abstract: Background The electronic health record (EHR) is integral to improving healthcare efficiency and quality. Its successful implementation hinges on patient willingness to use it, particularly in Germany where concerns about data security and privacy …
